body:
Hello there MinaYaku,
Maybe you could give kousaka gambler anoda chance by checking Pakesys force on Vandread cuz i suppose Takeshi musou diaries would be too Medarots for you.
Anyways all those have 3 to 4 some orgy which is the best any doujin can offer specially when its tagged and in English.
Its like a crash course into a series even more in depth than most trailers or eiga movies.

Hello!!
Wheres Aoi Hanamura tag?
Shes in the cover for crying out loud!!
Her name means blue village flower and shes gorgeous.
Then again kousaka gambler manages to make even medarots into orgies which are a feast to the eyes.
Real on turners.
Wish you could tag eye turners like her more often specially when theres so much yaoi on sports mangas particularly when they get sequels and remakes like this one.

Day 32 - 766*
The art was pretty good but other than that there is nothing good.
3/10.
